title: Viewing Habits
body: I'm working on a project pertaining to the viewing habits of LoL esports fans across different regions. I've already gotten a ton of responses so far, but as anyone that knows statistics knows, More Data = Better Data. It would really help me out if more people took this short poll. It's only 4 questions and it'll take less than a minute to complete! Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Just be careful, looks like you allow people to submit multiple times.

Cool idea,
 Don't forget to post results!
